subject: Not just a trend... Here's why
body:

subject: We will be closing at NOON this Saturday, February 14th
body:
Dear Cat's Corner Family,

Our office will be closing at NOON this Saturday, February 14th. Please plan your cat's medication and prescription food pickups accordingly.

Furthermore, we will not have a veterinarian on duty to see patients. If your cat experiences a medical emergency, please contact one of the area's Emergency Veterinary Hospitals.

Sincerely,
Cat's Corner Veterinary Hospital

It’s scheduled to arrive on Fri, Jan 16. We’ll let you know when it ships.

Your CVS Team

subject: We got your inquiry
body:
Dear David,
 
If performance isn't the thing there are plenty of conferences out there. I can give you some pointers on how to locate them. You can choose something close to home or in a different region. Topics run the gamut.

As for graphs, actually a very good friend of mine from Apple Labs was a leader in something called Conceptual Graphs. My recollection of this field is it focuses on the modeling of information in graphs (edges and nodes) so that it can be applied to AI systems.  This was developed in the 70s and 80s originally by a guy named Sowa. Perhaps you want to look into it. 

My friend led the annual conference in this area till his passing a few years back. You can search on his name - William Tepfenhart. I also notice that there are current references in this field including 2025 related to applying CGs to AI and LLMs etc.

Let me know if you want to talk with William.

Best,
Phyllis

subject: Reservation Confirmation
body:
Dear Abe,

Thank you for choosing the Hyannis Harbor Hotel for your stay in Hyannis, Massachusetts. If you have any questions about your reservation or need to make changes, please call us at: (800) 655-2047 or send us an email.

We look forward to welcoming you soon!

The Hyannis Harbor Hotel Team

CONFIRMATION DETAILS
Confirmation: xxx-xxx
Guest Name - Abe Abelton

Arrival Date
 
Monday, September 24, 2024

Departure Date
 
Tuesday, September 25, 2024

Room Type
 
+/- 700 square feet. King size bed on first floor with balcony and full bath. Spiral staircase leads upstairs to a second bedroom with two queen size beds and 120 square foot balcony with table seating four.

OUR POLICIES

Deposit Policy:  We require a one night deposit when booking most reservations. When reserving three or more rooms, we reserve the right to adjust cancellation and deposit policies.

Cancellation Policy: All reservations must be cancelled or modified by 6pm at least 72 hours prior to the date of arrival to avoid a no-show charge equal to the first night’s room rate and applicable taxes. - Reservations booked within the cancellation policy are non refundable

Check-In Time - 4:00 PM
Check-Out Time - 11:00 AM

Please be informed that we will not be accepting or exchanging cash at any Newport Hotel Group property.

Must be 21 years or older to check into a room.

At check-in, the name on the reservation and the credit card used for payment must match a valid government-issued photo ID. If the cardholder will not be present or the names do not match, a credit card authorization form is required or payment that matches must be provided. Please contact us at (800) 655-2047 before arrival to receive the form.

Hyannis Harbor Hotel
213 Ocean St | Hyannis, MA
800-655-2047

subject: Confirmation of changes to account
body:
Hi David,

The cost of your plan has changed. This change takes effect Monday, April 4th, 2026. You must confirm your updated membership details by visiting your Account by March 15th, 2026.

We hope you’re enjoying Netflix, and we're always adding new TV shows and movies for our members to enjoy.

We're here to help if you need it. Visit the Help Center for more info or contact us.

–The Netflix Team

body:
You paid Abe $10 on 303/01/2026

–Venmo

For any issues, including the recipient not receiving funds, please contact us at Help Center at help.venmo.com or call 1-855-812-4430.

This payment will be reviewed for compliance with our User Agreement and if we determine that there is a violation by either party, it may be reversed or your ability to transfer to your bank account may be restricted.

subject: Kindness tastes better with cookies
body:
Hey David,
Random Acts of Kindness Day may have been earlier this week, but honestly, kindness doesn’t belong to just one date on the calendar

Sometimes the smallest gesture can turn someone’s entire day around.

A surprise delivery.
A sweet “thinking of you.”
A box of cookies arriving when they least expect it

Because kindness tastes better with cookies.

This week, consider sending a little sweetness to:

A coworker who’s been going the extra mile
A neighbor who always helps out
A teacher who deserves a thank-you
A friend who could use a pick-me-up

No big announcement or special occasion required.

Just a simple reminder that someone’s appreciated.

And if you’re waiting for a sign to brighten someone’s day, this is it!

subject: Gemini 3.1 Pro
body:
TLDR AI 2026-02-20

Watch Pliny the Liberator probe LLM vulnerabilities onstage (Sponsor)

Pliny the Liberator is AI's most notorious jailbreak researcher, known for turning “harmless” LLMs into offensive tools. 

This April at the SANS AI Cybersecurity Summit in Arlington, VA, Pliny will appear masked while probing model vulnerabilities on the frontier of offensive AI.


Manage your subscriptions to our other newsletters on tech, startups, and programming. Or if TLDR AI isn't for you, please unsubscribe

subject: Claude Sonnet 4.6
body:

QA Wolf's AI-native service supports web and mobile apps, delivering 80% automated test coverage in weeks and helping teams ship 5x faster by reducing QA cycles to minutes.
